name: 2D3D Endless Runner
description:
A simple endless runner game where you're a paper hero breaking incoming blocks and let fleeing paper civilians through.

You can keep going as long you have your morale up. 

Morale is lost when you letting blocks through or blocking paper civilians.

Controls:

Move left and right using [A] [D] or [left] [right] keys.

Press or hold [space] to do an attack.

Press or hold [ctrl] + [space] to do a wide attack.
